snippet: Although outdoor games are always fun, this isn't the first time they have been played. Ohio State forward Danny Dries offers ideas on how to make this event stand out from the others.
abstract: Although outdoor games are always fun, this isn't the first time they have been played. Ohio State forward Danny Dries offers ideas on how to make this event stand out from the others.
lead_paragraph: Now that everyone has caught up on our team from my last blog, I can preview this weekend's outdoor game against Michigan at Progressive Field. The Frozen Diamond Faceoff, as it has been named, should be a great event, and I encourage everyone to try and make it out or catch it on TV.

headline.main: Ohio State Diary: Taking Outdoor Games to Another Level
